global.coc_home_description: The business enterprise welcomes the entry of the chamber of Commerce of various industries, converge the well-known chamber of Commerce, and the business enterprise is the preferred platform for the chamber of Commerce Management
global.coc_activity_description: The business enterprise channel brings together all the information issued by the chamber of Commerce, including the activities of the industry and the region, and anticipate your registration.

global.coc_news_description: The business enterprise news channel brings together the news information issued by all the chambers of Commerce

global.statement_two: Please transfer the membership fee to the chamber of Commerce and retain the certificate in seven working days. The chamber of Commerce will check the application of your membership within seven working days after receiving the payment.
global.statement_three: If the audit is not passed, the chamber of Commerce will contact you to return your cost

prompt.title: warm hints
prompt.add_coc_text: you can create multiple chamber of commerce information here, and the information of each chamber of commerce is managed separately.
prompt.settled_coc_text: (please fill in the true information, the chamber of commerce information audit success, can be published in the background of a number of chamber of commerce information)
prompt.settled_success: your information has been submitted successfully, 1-3 working days audit, please wait for patience.
prompt.add_framework_text: (In accordance with the framework of the chamber of Commerce, please add the category of chamber of Commerce and set the corresponding cost.).
prompt.update_lgo_text: please upload the chamber of Commerce logo, the size of the picture is not more than 1M.
prompt.update_cover_text: please upload the master diagram of the chamber of Commerce, the size of the picture is not more than 5M.
prompt.update_news_cover: please upload the cover of the article, the size of the picture is not more than 5M.
prompt.add_avatar_text: Please upload a personal image, the size of the picture is not more than 5M.
prompt.update_avatar_text: Amend the personal image, the size of the picture is not more than 5M.
prompt.update_aptitude_text: please upload the qualifications of the chamber of Commerce, the size of the picture is not more than 5M.
prompt.update_file_size_text: before uploading, please change the size of the picture to a width of 640* 400. The size of the picture is less than 5M.
prompt.update_certificates_text: please upload the ID card positive, and the contact name of the contact, the size of the picture is not more than 5M.
